text: Adudagi Jisuna nupa aduda hairak-i, “Yeng-u, masi mi kana amatada haidokkanu; adubu nahakna chattuna purohitta yeng-hallu. Aduga mipum khudingmakna nahak naba phare haiba khangnanaba Moses-na katlu hairamba potlamsing adu katcharu.” Asumna akanba yathang asi piraga khudak aduda Jisuna mahakpu thakhre.
